name: Candy Corn Defense
description:
Grow, Build, Defend. Candy Corn Defense is a game about growing candy corn to build candy corn turrets and destroy monsters. Monsters come in waves so you must use different turrets and upgrade them to survive. *This game was made for a Game Jam and is a very early build that may contain bugs and glitches.

Patch Notes

V 0.1    Made Turrets Stronger
